overview: From the makers of the ground breaking DVD 'ABSOLUTION' Primal introduces the first of a series of heavy sleaze DVDs. Recorded at one of the notorious Primal Sex Parties - a full-on playroom session of sucking, fucking, fisting with raw animal attitude. Shot in Derby, England, there's non-stop action as the boys grease up and stretch their arses for a night of heavy, heavy anal action. No frills, no bullshit just wall to wall raw, Primal sex. Includes extras. NOTE: this film is bareback contrary to the regular Primal-titles; this is because the sex party turned out to be 100% raw.
title: Primal Pigs
